attributes.action: Car insurance has increased substantially a review should be conducted.
attributes.additional_details: Cost of living crisis, heating, Ulez all means less expendable income. Insurance is needed if we are to remain driving legally. With the current crisis I fear many will take the risk rather pay the extortionate fees leading to many other issues.
attributes.background: I Would like the government to review car insurance legislation and bring in rules to cap or not allow companies to charge excessively, make it fair. Premiums have soared in excess of 50% for myself despite no claims or convictions. We have no choice if we wish to remain driving legally.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793
